Title: Destabilize
Text: Set an enemy creature's health to 1.

Title: Smite the Monstrous
Text: Destroy an enemy creature with power 5 or greater.

Title: Shields Up
Text: Before a friendly creature fights, give it armor.

Title: Snapshell Turtle
Text: After you play a trap, gets +1/+0.

Title: Shell Game
Text: Transform an enemy creature into a Stone Turtle.

Title: Disorient
Text: After your opponent attacks, the strongest attacking creature gets -3/-0.

Title: Call the Wind
Text: At the end of your opponent's turn, summon a Wind Elemental.

Title: Recycled Grotesque
Text: Destroy a friendly creature to summon this from your hand.

Title: Deathspeaker Naga
Text: Finale: Add a Zombie to your hand.

Title: Gravedigger
Text: Debut: Return the strongest creature from your graveyard to your hand.

Title: Fearsome Return
Text: Summon the strongest creature in your graveyard.

Title: Grave Disturbance
Text: After your opponent attacks, summon a Zombie.

Title: Blood Chalice
Text: Activate: Deal 1 damage to yourself and give a friendly creature +2/+1.

Title: Goblin Shortcutter
Text: Debut: Give an enemy creature can't block this turn.

Title: Goblin Vandal
Text: Debut: Each enemy artifact loses a charge.

Title: Dragon Hatchling
Text:
Flying
Attack: Deal 1 damage to your opponent.

Title: Axefury Minotaur
Text: Debut: Gets +2/+2 if your opponent was dealt damage this turn.

Title: Bombastic Boost
Text: Give a friendly creature +2/+1 and can't block.

Title: Molten Misstep
Text: After your opponent attacks, deal 4 damage to a random attacking creature.

Title: Rod of Ruin
Text: Activate: Deal 1 damage to an enemy.

Title: Grudge Match
Text: Give a friendly creature +1/+1, then choose an enemy creature. They fight!

Title: Overrun
Text: Give all friendly creatures +3/+0 and trample this turn.

Title: Giant Growth
Text: Before a friendly creature fights, give it +3/+2.

Title: Horncharge Lantern
Text: Activate: Give a friendly creature trample.

Title: Sylvan Shrine
Text: Activate: Get an empty mana gem.

Title: Piston-Fist Pummeler
Text: Debut: Deal 1 damage to an enemy.

Title: Reflective Golem
Text: Debut: If your starting deck and Spellslinger are 1 color, double this creature's power and health.

Title: Collaborate
Text: Each player gets an empty mana gem.

Title: Ejected!
Text: Put an enemy creature into your opponent's deck.

Title: Scoreboard
Text: Activate: Each player draws a card.
